name: tidal-controller
title: Tidal Controller
description: Control your local Tidal client with your keyboard.
author: 0xdreamweaver

commands.name: play-pause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.description: Toggles the play/pause state of your current song on Tidal.

commands.name: next-song
commands.title: Next Song
commands.description: Plays the next song in Tidal.

commands.name: prev-song
commands.title: Previous Song or Restart Song
commands.description: Plays the previous song in Tidal.

commands.name: pause
commands.title: Pause Song
commands.description: Pauses the current song in Tidal.

commands.name: play
commands.title: Play Song
commands.description: Plays the current song in Tidal.

preferences.name: show-messages
preferences.label: Show Messages
preferences.title: Show Messages
preferences.description: Show pop up messages when an action is performed, such as toggling play/pause. Will also show a message if the action fails for some reason.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
